4 Star May will join your team of Heroes.\nRecruiting May will give you a 25% discount at her Shop.
4 Star Gladi will join your team of Heroes.\nRecruiting Gladi gives you a 10% discount on Unique Weapons in the Arena Shop.
4 Star Veronica will join your team of Heroes.\nRecruiting Veronica gives you a 10% discount on items in the Guild Shop.
4 Star Loman will join your team of Heroes.\nRecruiting Loman will give you a 10% discount at the Royal Orvel Shop.
4-Star Juno joins your team of Heroes.\nIf you own Juno, you get a 40% discount at the Hero's Inn Shop.
4 Star Nicky joins as Hero.\nHaving Nicky in the Hero list increases daily recharge for Stockade Key by 1.

4 Star Dosarta will join you as a Hero.\nHaving Dosarta will allow you to obtain 2 more Artifact Pieces as a reward when you complete a repeat mission for Tower of Challenge.\nLoot Booster will be applied to additional rewards.
4 Star Hanus will join your team of Heroes.\nRecruiting Hanus will increase ATK Spd of all allies by 100 during Guild War.
5 Star Cain will join your team of Heroes.\nRecruiting Cain will increase ATK of all allies by 20% during Eclipse Mode.

A dish made by soaking peeled hard fruit in mushroom juice and cooking it. It is very aromatic.
A dish made by cleaning silver catfish and then grilling it with sliced butterfly mushrooms.
A goat stew made with a special sour and salty sauce from thorn flowers and rock salt.
An egg boiled in a homemade sauce. It makes you full when you eat it for lunch.
A traditional hard-boiled egg. It was ranked 15th by Gourmet Association of the Kingdom for must-eat foods.
An egg boiled in the official royal sauce. One of the ultimate delicacies recognized by Gourmet Association of the Kingdom.
A rusted, worn-out iron sword. It can't even be sold as scrap metal.
A long sword with a broken handle. It may cost more to repair it.
A long iron sword with a partially broken blade. It could be sold as scrap metal.
A long, fine sword covered with cracks. The jewel in the handle looks expensive.
A long sword used by a war hero long ago. Artifact collectors would love to get their hands on it.
A great sword that only the Dragon Cavalry can wield. It could be scrapped for a hefty sum.
Leather armor with holes all over. There is very little that is salvageable.
Iron armor with broken joints. It looks like it can never be taken off again once it has been equipped.
Half-broken Scale Armor. Only a skilled blacksmith can repair it.
The Holy Warrior's cracked armor. Cannot feel any blessings on it.
Armor worn by a war hero. Artifact collectors would love to get their hands on it.
Heavy armor that only the Dragon Cavalry can wear. It could be scrapped for a hefty sum.
A rusted copper ring. It may cost more to melt it down.
A bent silver ring. It looks like something horrible bent it.
A fragment of a magic ring. Cannot feel any magic energy.
A cracked sorcery ring. Could shatter upon the slightest impact.
A war hero's ring. Artifact collectors would love to get their hands on it.
A ring that the Dragon Cavalry used to wear. It is so large and heavy, it could be mistaken for a shackle.
A white edible mushroom commonly seen all over Orvelia. It is tasty and nutritious.
Green grass that is shaped like a lion. It is said to bring luck just by looking at it. A rare plant that is seldom seen.
This ore is frequently found in the crevices of old rocks. Its mysterious color makes it invaluable.
What? It sparkles, but is not a gem? It won't be worth any money. So disappointed.' - Miruru
A small fruit covered in a hard peel. When it is fully-ripe, the skin makes a clicking sound when it is peeled to reveal aromatic flesh.
A small fruit that rabbits love. Its sweet flavor explodes when you take a bite.
A little stone with the power of spirits. A rare item found in the territory of the spirits.
Do not fear the darkness in the forest. They may be little plants, but they could be a wander's salvation. - Lorraine
Catfish that only live in clean water. Big ones are over 2 m long and taste delicious when you cook them.
A type of mushroom that is found deep in the forest. It has a toxin that causes slight paralysis, so it tastes electrifying.
A totem that Orcs carry. There is a bird carved into the piece of stone to symbolize the wind.
Meat of a one-horned goat that Orcs love. It's tasty when it's roasted or used to make a soup.
Humans, set aside your prejudices. It may look poisonous, but it is used as an antidote. Keep that in mind. - Dimael
Goat's milk from the one-horned goats that roam wild on the hillside. It has a strong taste.
Rock salt that can be collected from the rocks on the hillside. An ingredient famous for its flavor and saltiness.
Grass with roots shaped like a turtle. It grows well in any harsh terrain. Although it is inedible, it is popular as ornamental grass.
Fragments of the backbone of a huge animal that is extinct now. They are popular with collectors.
Sometimes idiots eat these mushrooms and dance and sing until they collapse. It is fun to watch.' - Epis
Poor people... You are stuck in this little stone and lost, right? I will set you free.' - Rephy
A mutant plant generated after being affected by the dark energy of the cemetery. It is used as material for magic reagents.
A low-class mineral that is used to make items.
A middle-class mineral that is used to make items.
A high-quality mineral that is used to make items.
A premium-quality mineral that is used to make items.
Low-class leather that is used to make items.
Middle-class leather that is used to make items.
A high-quality leather that is used to make items.
A premium-quality leather that is used to make items.
A low-class cloth that is used to make items.
A middle-class cloth that is used to make items.
A high-quality cloth that is used to make items.
A premium-quality cloth that is used to make items.
White downy hair hidden inside the wings of a harpy.
Long feathers from the outermost part of the harpy's wings.
Even Kasel can't eat this. I have to throw it away or sell it.' - Cleo
Stinky mushroom juice. The rotten ones stink and are used for insecticide.
What? Am I the only one who likes it? Please don't look at me like that!' - Kasel
The hard shell of a tortoise. Used as ornaments, the price differs depending on the size.
The meat of the ferocious wolf. Although it is notorious for having an unpleasant bad, some regions hold eating contests.
The skin of a wolf. It is used to craft clothes or armor.
The bark of a Treant. With a little bit of mana, it is used to make magic tools.
The sap of a Treant. Harder to find than the bark, it is used to craft rare magic items.
It's fun to hunt down, but tastes really bad. Since there are still some people looking for it, bring it to the shop. - Maya
Huge horns of the Horned Bears. Although they are used as decorations, they are sometimes used to make equipment.
The huge wing of a giant wasp. It is ground into power and used to make medicine.
Kasel, stop eating the honey! We use honey for medicinal purposes and as a preservative!' - Cley
I can't eat it! Even I can't eat this!' - Kasel
The teeth of a great worm. They are processed to be used as arrowheads.
The stem of an insect-eating plant. If dried well, it can be used to make quality rope that is soft yet tough.
The colorful, unique petals of an insect-eating plant. It is used to dye clothes.
Oh no... I shouldn't have eaten that. It tastes really bad...' - Kasel
A spider web that cannot be cut with a knife. It is used as material for high-quality clothes, but it is hard to come by.
A fragment of a golem. It can be reused by extracting the magical power that remains.
The core part of a golem. It is good enough to be reused without an extra processing.
It has the power to enhance the characteristics of items into special properties of powder.

Upon using a Small Inventory Expansion Ticket, can expand 80 slots of Inventory. If this item is used when the total expandable slot is smaller than the Ticket's capacity, can only expand up to 1200 slots.

Upon using a Large Inventory Expansion Ticket, can expand 400 slots of Inventory. If this item is used when the total expandable slot is smaller than the Ticket's capacity, can only expand up to 1200 slots.

Upon using Extra Large Inventory Expansion Ticket, you can expand 720 slots of Inventory. If this item is used when the total expandable slot is smaller than the Ticket's capacity, can only expand up to 800 slots.

This Small Storage Box Expansion Ticket expands your Storage Box by 40 slots. If this item is used when the expandable slot total is smaller than the Ticket's capacity, it can only expand up to 800 slots.

This Large Storage Box Expansion Ticket expands your Storage Box by 200 slots. If this item is used when the total expandable slot is smaller than the Ticket's capacity, can only expand up to 800 slots.
